EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining Pivotal and ECS Team’s Cloud-Native Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for attending the recent joint Pivotal-ECS Team Cloud-Native Workshop in Santa Monica. We appreciate you committing the time to attend the event.
Success Factors for a Mature Microservices Implementation We hope that you found the session helpful and left with a clear list of considerations to take into account when building your cloud-native development strategy. For your reference we have included the presentation slides (below) for the session as well a link <[[https://github.com/JohnFunk-Pivotal/CloudBrews-SampleApp]]> to the Repo for the lab exercise.
- Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-workshop-santa-monica-2]]> - Success Factors for a Mature Microservices Implementation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-days-success-factors-for-a-mature-microservices-implementation]]> - Business Challenges for 2017...And What IT Should Do About Them <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-workshop-santa-monica]]>
We strongly encourage you to review these items and reach out to Pivotal Account Executive Matt Hammel or ECS Team’s Cloud Practice should you have any questions. Matt can be reached directly at mhammel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mhammel@pivotal.io]]>, while ECS Team can be reached at cloud@ecsteam.com <[[mailto:cloud@ecsteam.com]]>. Thank you again for joining us!
Sincerely, Pivotal and ECS Team
